Ink and Switch | P2P Research (Electron, React/Redux, IPFS/Dat, CRDTs) | Freelance Contract (6wks) | Remote (working with PST)

Ink & Switch is an industrial research lab focused on improving creative productivity through better tools. Our past work has included exploring improvements to tools for data journalists, note-taking software designed for minimal engagement, distributed whiteboards, cryptographic identity protocols, and zero-infrastructure web applications.

Our next project is an experiment with a P2P Electron application.

Feel free to email me at pvh@inkandswitch.com and/or apply via this Workable link (https://inkandswitch.workable.com/j/0DE157996E) which includes a lot more detail.
